title: Rename Container to Module in autogradpp and reorg code
body_html:
This PR:

  1. Renames ContainerImpl to Module (torch::nn::Module),
  2. Moves the clone() functionality of Container_CRTP into torch::nn::CloneableModule<T>
  3. Moves the make() functionality of Container_CRTP into a free make() function. This is a temporary solution until we come up with a better API for module construction. I just wanted to get rid of Container_CRTP.
  4. Removes the AUTOGRAD_CONTAINER_CLASS macro in favor of : public CloneableModule<T>
  5. Reorgs code from containers.{h,cpp} into more fine-grained files: rnn.{h,cpp}, conv.{h,cpp} etc.
  6. Removes the Container = std::shared_ptr<Module> in favor of the explicit type

@ebetica @jgehring
body_text:

Renames ContainerImpl to Module (torch::nn::Module),
Moves the clone() functionality of Container_CRTP into torch::nn::CloneableModule<T>
Moves the make() functionality of Container_CRTP into a free make() function. This is a temporary solution until we come up with a better API for module construction. I just wanted to get rid of Container_CRTP.
Removes the AUTOGRAD_CONTAINER_CLASS macro in favor of : public CloneableModule<T>
Reorgs code from containers.{h,cpp} into more fine-grained files: rnn.{h,cpp}, conv.{h,cpp} etc.
Removes the Container = std::shared_ptr<Module> in favor of the explicit type

@ebetica @jgehring
body:
This PR:
1. Renames `ContainerImpl` to `Module` (`torch::nn::Module`),
2. Moves the `clone()` functionality of `Container_CRTP` into `torch::nn::CloneableModule<T>`
3. Moves the `make()` functionality of `Container_CRTP` into a free `make()` function. This is a temporary solution until we come up with a better API for module construction. I just wanted to get rid of `Container_CRTP`.
4. Removes the `AUTOGRAD_CONTAINER_CLASS` macro in favor of `: public CloneableModule<T>`
5. Reorgs code from `containers.{h,cpp}` into more fine-grained files: `rnn.{h,cpp}`, `conv.{h,cpp}` etc.
6. Removes the `Container = std::shared_ptr<Module>` in favor of the explicit type

@ebetica @jgehring
